attributes.action: Bring back a second series of Lilies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC recently broadcast an excellent drama called 'Lilies'.  They have recently decided not to make a new series.  I would ask that you check the BBC message boards to understand the feeling of outrage viewers are feeling.  Thank you

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
